cn.artistName: Beijing NetEase Youdao Computer System Co.,Ltd
cn.sellerName: Beijing NetEase Youdao Computer System Co.,Ltd
cn.releaseNotes: 已修复部分已知问题，体验进一步优化～
cn.description:
【网易有道词典桌面端】正式改名为【网易有道翻译】
——比强大更强大的翻译生产力工具，让你的电脑瞬间变身AIPC
 针对Mac平台特性，我们特别推出全新的版本，作为Mac系统下必备的翻译软件，在同类软件排行位居前列，10亿用户都在用！

用AI重新定义翻译，WE DO MORE THAN TRANSLATION！

【AI翻译助手】
翻译更精准，表达更地道，还能自由问答～
随时随地选中长句段落或截图，即可唤起功能～
 【AIBox 跨软件工具】
选中长句段落，智能润色、改写、纠错一步到位～
-句子润色：为你提供五种语言风格，一键升级地道高级句；
-语法纠错：母语级纠错，帮你调整词汇、语法、结构；
-写作建议：优化文章的同时为你提供写作建议；
-重点提炼：复杂长文精准提炼重点；
-单词百科：无需打开搜索引擎，即可快速检索语句百科知识；
【AI文档翻译·问答】
-一键上传文档，全文翻译；
-支持多格式、多语种、多专业领域；
-保留原文排版，双语对照查看；
-便捷译后批注，支持一键导出；
-同时还能自动总结，深度问答；
-已开放240万字符/年免费翻译额度，让你想翻就翻，随手就翻，敞开了翻！
【AI写作】
-一键成文，AI快速生成邮件、通知模板内容，提高生产力；
-母语级润色、扩写、总结、去重等功能助力内容质量提升；
-智能纠错，智能识别200种错误，覆盖语法、词汇、拼写、格式等；
【AI一键创作PPT】
只需输入主题，即刻生成一份布局配色丰富的PPT~
 
强大的桌面翻译软件，什么都能帮你翻！

 【有道词典】
-实时收录最新词汇；支持英汉、日汉、韩汉、法汉、德汉、俄汉、葡汉、西汉互译；
-完整收录《学习型牛津词典》、《新牛津英汉双解大词典》、《韦氏大学英语词典》、《柯林斯COBUILD高级英汉双解词典》、《新世纪日汉双解大辞典》、龙朝《韩中词典》《中韩词典》等权威词典；
-单词图谱：可视化词典+思维导图记忆法；
-单词笔记：支持添加单词笔记，同步保存单词本；
【文本翻译】
-长短句实时翻译，109种语言互译，26种常用语种tts发音；；
-支持医学、计算机、金融经济三种专业领域翻译；
-提供42个专业术语库&上传自定义术语库；
-快捷键翻译：选中任意文本按下Command+2，快速获取翻译结果；
【音频翻译】
-从听到看，一键搞定；
-中英文音频快速转录->翻译->整理为高质量文本；
-支持100MB以内的MP3、WAV、AAC多种音频格式；
【视频翻译】
-字幕制作，省时高效；
-提取视频内原字幕->翻译->生成新字幕；
-自动生成字幕时间轴，一键导出srt字幕文件；
【截图翻译】
-按下Shift+Command+2，选取屏幕上的任意区域实现快速翻译；
-截屏翻译结果支持一键钉至屏幕，随时进行下一次翻译。多次截屏翻译的结果同时查看，省时高效；
【图片翻译】
-快速识别、提取、翻译图片中的文本，支持99种语言；
-支持macOS的“连续互通”相机功能，用iPhone或iPad拍摄任意文本，自动导入Mac；
【同传翻译】
支持中英日韩等14种语言互译，实时展示多人同传翻译字幕；
【状态栏菜单】
不打开主窗口，也能在mini窗口快速查词；
【网页翻译】
输入网址快速翻译网页内容，保持原排版信息，阅读体验舒适流畅；
【人工翻译】
提供专业定制化服务；
 
【超级会员自动续费说明】
1、服务名称：超级会员自动续费
2、价格：38元/月
3、购买会员自动续费的账号，会在每个月到期前24小时，自动在iTunes账户扣费并延长1个月会员有效期。
4、如需取消订阅，请打开“App Store”--> 点击“商店”中的 “查看我的账户”，选择"查看信息"，进入"我的账户信息"页面，点击“管理”，取消“有道词典VIP服务”订阅即可。如未在订阅期结束的至少24小时前关闭订阅，此订阅将会自动续订。
5、会员自动续费服务协议：https://c.youdao.com/dict/law/renew.html
6、隐私协议：https://c.youdao.com/dict/law/youdaofanyi_pc_privacy.html
 
【联系我们】
微信：有道翻译
官方网站：fanyi.youdao.com/download

cn.trackCensoredName: 音频剪辑 – 手机铃声制作&mp3音乐剪辑
cn.artistName: Wuhan Net Power Technology Co., Ltd
cn.trackName: 音频剪辑 – 手机铃声制作&mp3音乐剪辑
cn.sellerName: Wuhan Net Power Technology Co., Ltd
cn.description:
想制作属于自己独特炫酷的苹果手机铃声吗？或者有时会想把多首歌曲拼接起来当串烧，合并成自己想要的音乐？还是想知道不同歌曲混音后效果？
音乐剪辑（幂果）是一款操作方便的音乐mp3剪切合并混音工具。简单出色，功能实用！不管你是专业音乐人还是音乐小白，都能轻松玩转。

功能特点：
1、专业的铃声剪辑：可自由剪辑，已为您设定铃声最大时长为40s（符合手机铃声特点）！
2、简单的音乐拼接：歌曲剪辑拼接为一体，串烧喜欢的歌曲吧！
3、独特的混音合成：随意剪辑两首曲子，混合一起播放，可以感受不一样的音乐效果！

订阅说明：
- 订阅VIP后，您可以无限制使用所有的功能
- 订阅提供4个时间段的VIP服务，包括：每周VIP服务，每月VIP服务，每年VIP服务，永久VIP服务
- 订阅每周15元，每月30元，每年88元和永久98元
- 购买过程是从iTunes账户中扣除购买金额
- 账户将在当前周期前 24 小时内按所选套餐的费用收取费用
- 有效订阅期间不允许取消当前订阅。但您可以取消下一次订阅。
- 您可以访问(长按) https://www.camoryapps.com/netpower/privacy_policy/musicmixer_cn.html 来阅读我们的隐私政策
- 您可以访问(长按) https://www.camoryapps.com/netpower/service/musicmixer_cn.html 来阅读服务条款
*价格相当于“苹果App Store矩阵”所确定的相当于以美元为单位的认购价。

cn.releaseNotes:
Remixlive 8.4 扩展了您在步进音序器中的创作可能性，加入了复音功能！

8.4 版本：
新功能：
- 多音阶步进音序器： 通过直观创新的界面创作旋律并弹奏和弦，重新定义步进音序器。

改进：
- 修复错误并改进用户界面
cn.description:
Remixlive是制作人和DJ的完美节拍制作和现场表演应用。

播放、干扰、混合和重新混合你的音乐。直播!
• 最多可以播放48个音调和节奏同步的循环片段 
• 实时改变调子和BPM
• 即兴演奏和录制现场鼓和乐器
• 使用专业级FXs实时塑造和重采样你的声音
• 创建你自己的序列和模式
• 在时间轴上安排你的声音来完成你的歌曲

用独家样本库为你的曲目增添色彩!
• 在20多种音乐类型中获得超过32000个专业级样本
• 由顶级声音设计师和世界级艺术家完美打造。
• 免收版权费用，可在任何平台上进行个人和商业使用。
• 每周都有新内容！

享受先进的专业级功能!
• 专业音频引擎和样本时间拉伸
• 导入你自己的样本（MP3、WAV、AAC、M4A、AIFF、16/24比特）。
• 连接任何MIDI控制器，你想要多少就有多少 (Launchpad Mini/MK2/MK3/Pro/S/X, AKAI APCMini/MPKminiMK3/APCKey25, DJControl Compact...)
• 用我们的AI干线分离算法对任何歌曲进行混音
• 记录和采样任何音源（Audiobus/麦克风/声卡）
• 通过Ableton Link ""与你的朋友们进行现场演出。

Remixlive拥有您所需要的一切，以创建令人惊叹的曲目，释放您的创造力，并进行令人难忘的现场表演。任何地方!

他们喜欢remixlive

"在便携式设备上制作专业音轨的非常直观的方法。"
- DJ Mag (新闻)

"我已经把Remixlive整合到我的DJ组合中，它提供了很多创造性的潜力。我会向任何艺术家推荐Remixlive，因为它非常简单，你可以创造出很多有趣和鼓舞人心的东西！"
- T78（艺术家）

"绝对令人惊奇的应用程序，太有趣了！它就像一个混合的Dj和一个混合的音乐播放器。它就像一个混合的Dj和作曲工具。我被它的力量和可靠性震惊了。"
- Crystalogic（Remixlive用户）

高级计划和购买
您可以选择单独购买样品包和功能，或通过订阅计划一次性解锁所有功能。

高级订阅计划
Remixlive有月度或年度订阅计划，可以解锁所有可用的和未来的功能，让你获得整个26000多个样本库以及每周一个新的样本包。

条款和条件
购买确认后，付款将从您的账户中扣除。除非在当前期限结束前至少24小时关闭自动续订，否则订阅将自动续订。账户将在当前期限结束前24小时内被收取续订费用，并确定续订费用。订阅可以由用户管理，自动续订可以在购买后进入用户的账户设置中关闭。

使用条款
https://www.mixvibes.com/terms

隐私政策
https://www.mixvibes.com/privacy

advisories: 偶尔/轻微的惊悚或恐怖题材
偶尔/轻微的烟酒或毒品使用或相关内容
cn.releaseNotes:
1、修正投矛手少了头上两侧和胸口的獠牙的问题；
2、修正挥棒兵少了腰间的三个骨头的问题；
3、修正投石兵少了脖子上的骨头的问题；
4、修正骨杖法师脖子、腰间、手腕骨头缺少的问题；
5、修正酋长少了腰上的骨头的问题；
6、修正“恐龙骑兵盾牌在编辑界面显示错误，盾牌上的骨头不显示。在测试兵种和战斗场景都正常”的问题；
7、修正TABG游猎帽戴上后角色眼睛会消失的问题；
8、修正亡灵凯尔特女妖上臂环00改颜色只有一边变色的问题；
9、恢复了定制内容-头部中缺失的TABG熊猫帽00。
cn.description:
一款近乎真实、专业的战争模拟游戏！置身战略军事沙盒中，畅享接近现实的物理引擎。Landfall官方授权，Steam超12万条玩家评测，97%好评率，在游戏中排兵布阵，战术演练，带给你身临其境的战争体验。

游戏基于PC原版移植，买断制发售，并针对手机玩家的操作和观看体验做出专门优化。

【史诗级的战役演出】
在战役模式中，巧妙利用地图地形和兵种阵容，制定花式布兵打法投入战场。由于“超现实”的物理引擎效果，战斗中将会迸发许多意料之外的状况；拉进镜头，切换子弹时间，好戏才刚刚上演！

【100+天马行空的兵种】
游戏提供百余种性能（性格）各不相同的兵种，来自各个派系、时代文明和神话传说。从发射尖刺的仙人掌到召唤分身耍棍的孙悟空，这些“训练有素”的战士能够对战局起到蝴蝶效应般的影响。

【自定义沙盒，兵种DIY】
不满足于挑战既定的战役？玩转沙盒模式，自由切换地图，自定义战局和对战阵容，随意拿捏自己想要的兵种属性、服装，和武器技能，打造独一无二的奇迹憨憨军团演绎精彩战斗。

【支持联机】
手机版加入联机对战模式和房间大厅；随机匹配，又或是邀请好友尽情切磋！

4、如需取消订阅，请打开“App Store”--> 点击“商店”中的 “查看我的账户”，选择"查看信息"，进入"我的账户信息"页面，点击“管理”，取消“有道词典VIP服务”订阅即可。如未在订阅期结束的至少24小时前关闭订阅，此订阅将会自动续订。

Filca 是一款单反胶卷相机。
35种胶卷滤镜和电影效果让您的照片栩栩如生。

@veteranUser
"没有Filca，你只是在收集时刻，
有了Filca，你在保存记忆。"

使用Filca的专家级手动控制精通您的拍摄。

■ 手动模式下的快门速度、ISO、白平衡控制
■ 来自业界领导者如Kodak、Fuji、Agfa的35mm胶卷滤镜

Filca旨在优化您的快照体验。
非常适合拍摄人物、自拍、夜景以及捕捉日常生活的微妙美丽。
应用我们的滤镜，以实现真正的模拟胶片外观。

主要特性：

- 带35mm胶卷滤镜的自动模式相机
- 手动模式（曝光和对焦）
- 对快门速度、ISO的完全控制
- 各种宽高比：4:3、3:2、16:9、1:1
- 数字变焦可放大至8倍
- 手动对焦控制（微距、风景）
- 来自Fuji、Kodak、Agfa的35mm胶卷滤镜（包括黑白滤镜）
- 胶片颗粒效果
- 胶片日期打印效果
- 光学图像稳定
- 低功耗模式
- 自拍模式
- EXIF数据存储（包括位置数据）
- 人像增强
- 全分辨率照片
- 定时器和闪光灯功能
- 网格模式视图
- 专业特性：

白平衡调整功能
日期打印功能
在Instagram上使用#filca分享您的照片，我们期待展示您的作品。
关注我们的Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/filca.app/

使用条款：https://han.gl/HCCwV
隐私政策：https://han.gl/Wclkw

让我们与Filca一起提升您的摄影旅程。

cn.releaseNotes:
游戏表现优化。
新增英雄【猿神】悟空
cn.description:
《贪婪洞窟》全新英雄[猿神]悟空出世，独特双符文图纸效果，扫平洞窟一切妖魔鬼怪。

【简介】
《贪婪洞窟》是一款地牢探险Roguelike手游。游戏整体画风神秘而诡异，共有4种不同难度，400层随机地形迷宫，60多种不同的怪物和BOSS，300多件随机属性的可收集装备， 20000+字的线索式剧情。还有更多独特有趣的玩法等你发现！

【游戏背景】
在崇尚刀剑与魔法的弥尔顿大陆，一名冒险者在废弃多年的矿坑中发现了大量的金子和财宝，一夜之间他收获了从未想象的财富和名声。
消息随着北风迅速吹遍了整个大陆，各地的人蜂拥至此地却又心怀鬼胎。
你，芸芸众生中的一个普通年轻人，也带着旁人看不透的目的，来到了这个地方……

【游戏特色】
-探索随机洞窟
你永远不知道下一层洞窟会有什么——宝藏、迷雾、陷阱、密室？还是强大首领？游戏中充满了不确定性，玩家只有依靠自己的计谋与胆量，才能以最小的牺牲换取最大的收获。

-找寻卷轴 及时逃脱
逃脱卷轴是你离开洞窟唯一的物品，请务必尽快找到它！因为在洞窟内死亡后你将一无所获——所有辛苦打怪升级的经验、守财奴般积攒的金币、让你欣喜若狂的顶级宝物都将伴随你的死亡埋葬。

-宝箱遍地也暗藏杀机
在洞窟中有许多奇珍异宝等你发现，密室宝藏更不能错过。但是要小心那些看守宝藏的怪物，它们可是等着你上钩呢！甚至还有伪装成宝箱的怪物，让你防不胜防！

-角色养成 装备收集
在洞窟中消灭怪物能提升角色等级，合理分配属性点与技能点将让你更加从容面对洞窟的危险；升级、改造、附魔、点金你的装备，以面对更具难度的探险，甚至挑战邪恶首领，解开埋藏在洞窟的无尽秘密！

-宠物相伴 一起冒险
全新上线宠物系统，冒险之旅不再孤独！在冒险的旅途中，你将会在不同的际遇下，遇上这些宠物。它们各具特色，也有专属自己的独特能力，带上它们一起去冒险吧！

cn.releaseNotes:
New! Local Data Health feature in Settings > Storage
Fixes for Object validation in Observations and Observing Lists
Open Cluster radial velocity fixed
cn.description:
SkySafari makes stargazing a simple pleasure. It has the largest database of any astronomy app, includes every comet, asteroid, satellite & solar system object ever discovered, offers unparalleled accuracy, advanced planning and logging tools, flawless telescope control, and provides the very best experience under the stars when you depend on it. Don’t postpone joy. Discover why SkySafari is the #1 recommended astronomy app for serious amateur astronomers since 2009.

Here's what’s new in version 7:

+ Complete support for iOS 18 and iPhone 16. Version 7 brings a new and immersive stargazing experience.

+ Events Finder - go to the new Events section to unlock a powerful search engine that finds astronomical events visible tonight and far into the future. The finder dynamically generates a listing of moon phases, eclipses, planetary moon events, meteor showers and planetary phenomenon such as conjunctions, elongations and oppositions.

+ Notifications - the notifications section has been completely revamped to allow you to customize and manage which events trigger an alert notification on your device.

+ Telescope Support - telescope control is at the heart of SkySafari.  Version 7 takes a giant leap forward by supporting ASCOM Alpaca, INDI & StarSense Explorer.  These next generation control protocols allow you to effortlessly connect to hundreds of compatible astronomical devices.

SkySafari 7 brings social stargazing to mobile devices with two new features to help you connect with other like minded people.

OneSky - allows you to see what other users are observing, in real time.  This feature highlights objects in the sky chart and indicates with a number how many users are observing a particular object.

SkyCast - allows you to guide a friend or group around the night sky through their own copy of SkySafari. After initiating SkyCast, you can generate a link and conveniently share it with other SkySafari users via text message, apps or social media accounts.

+ Sky Tonight -  jump to the new Tonight section to see what’s visible in your sky tonight.  Expanded information has been designed to help plan your night and includes  Moon & Sun info, calendar curations, events and the best positioned deep sky and solar system objects.

+ Improved Observation Tools - SkySafari is the perfect tool to help you plan, record and organize your observations.  New workflows make it easier to add, search, filter and sort data.

+ Home Screen and Lock Screen Widgets  keep your favorite astro information at your fingertips.

The Small Touches:

+ You can now edit the Jupiter GRS Longitude Value in the Settings.
+ Better Moon Age calculation.
+ New grid & reference options allow you to display Solstice and Equinox markers, Orbit + Node markers for all solar system objects, and tick marks and labels for the Ecliptic, Meridian, and Equator reference lines.
+ Previous In-app Purchases are Now Free -  this includes the H-R diagram, 3D Galaxy view, and the PGC galaxy and GAIA star catalogs. Enjoy.
+ Many more.

If you haven't used SkySafari 7 Pro before, here's what you can do with it:

+ Hold your device up, and SkySafari 7 Pro will find stars, constellations, planets, and more!

+ Simulate the night sky up to 5MM years in the past or future! Animate meteor showers, conjunctions, eclipses, and other celestial events.

+ Control your telescope, log and plan your observations.

+ Optionally backup all of your observing data in our secure cloud storage and make it easily accessible to multiple devices as well as from our new web interface, LiveSky.com.

+ Augmented Reality (AR) mode

+ Night Vision.

+ Orbit Mode. Leave the Earth’s surface behind, and fly through our solar system.

+ Galaxy View shows the position of deep sky objects in our Milky Way!

https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

https://www.livesky.com/privacy.html

us.releaseNotes:
1. Runs natively on Apple Silicon M1, M2 chip.

us.description:
Audio Normalizer provides a batch normalizing feature that helps users to balance all the music and audio files to equal volume in the most popular audio formats like MP3, M4A, WAV, AAC, FLAC, WMA, AIFF, AMR, AC3, MP2, OGG, M4R, AU etc with high accuracy and at maximum speed with a single click.  

Is it annoying to adjust the volume of each file individually? Download Audio Normalizer for Mac now. 

Audio Normalizer Features:
1 Equalize multi-audio files to the same volume with a single click.
2 Leveling the volume of MP3, M4A, WAV files directly losslessly. 
3 Supports many popular audio formats: MP3, M4A, WAV, AAC, FLAC, WMA, AIFF, AMR, AC3, MP2, OGG, M4R, AU files.
4 Supports batch processing.
5 You can custom volume level.
6 Awesome Usability: Easy to use through a modern and clear user interface.

Please note that volume of DRM-protected files can not be analyzed and adjusted.

Audio Normalizer Feedback:
Any suggestion will be appreciated, email us at: market@effectmatrix.com

us.releaseNotes:
1.【Video Retouch】New double chin remover – get a more refined look in seconds
2.【AI Removal】Now supports removing passersby for cleaner photos
us.description:
Wink 
l Make any low-quality video & photo into HD/Ultra HD/4K with before/after comparisons.
l Making video editing easier than ever!
l Various creative video transition effects enhance final results!
l Fine-tune your selfies with video retouch tools to highlight your day!

Video ＆ Photo Enhance
- Video Enhancer: Enhance portraits and selfies to stunning output.
- 4K Upscaler: AI-powered 4K upscaling for enhanced video quality.
- Stabilize: Smooth out shaky footage for professional-looking videos. 
- Noise reduction: Reduce video noise and grain for professional-looking results.
-  AI Color: Give your video a vibrant, fresh look with our easy-to-use color enhancement tool

Video Retouch
- Manual Face Slimming: Adjust your facial features as you wish
- Body Shape: Achieve a supermodel physique!
- Stylish Makeup: Providing a range of natural makeup
- Face Editor: Remove acne, Face Plump, Skin tone ... and more!
- Whiten Teeth: Say goodbye to brown teeth and show off your smile!

Video Editing
- Professional Editing: Color, Crop, Speed, Split, Mirror, Soundtrack and more!
- Templates: Easily apply to create high-quality vlogs
- Quality Restoration: Clear AI-enhanced video restoration!
- Effects: Adds texts, stickers, and transitions to enhance your videos
- Automatic Subtitle: Utilizes intelligent voice recognition for easy text inputting


AI Captions
- Accurate AI subtitles for your videos in seconds 
- Support Bilingual: Create dual-language subtitles for your videos
- Support 8 languages

Wink VIP
- Access exclusive VIP features

Wink offers a wide range of exclusive VIP features to enhance retouching experience. We are committed to providing you with an improved service. We look forward to your continuing support.
- Subscriptions

Wink VIP-Monthly Subscription offers a subscription period of one month.
Wink VIP-Annual subscription entails a 12-month period.
*The subscription price is determined based on the information provided in the in-app purchase (iAP) application.

- Instructions for Payment and Cancellation

"Payment" will be credited to your iTunes account once you have confirmed and paid for your subscription.

"Renewal" subscriptions for "Monthly/Annual" plans are automatically renewed and will incur charges to your iTunes account following your purchase confirmation. The subscription will be automatically renewed. To cancel it, please disable the automatic renewal at least 24 hours before the subscription period ends. Within 24 hours before the subscription cycle expires, Apple will automatically debit your iTunes account, extending your subscription for a new cycle.

"To cancel your subscription, kindly navigate to the "Settings" section on your iPhone, click on "Apple ID," proceed to the "Subscription" screen, and choose "Wink" to terminate your subscription.

- Agreement
Terms of Service：https://pro.meitu.com/wink-cut/agreements/common/service-global.html?lang=en
Privacy Policy：https://pro.meitu.com/wink-cut/agreements/common/policy-global.html?lang=en

Rediscover the joy of the original Backyard Baseball 1997! Build your roster from the iconic cast of 30 characters stacked with charming personalities and witty banter, and get the edge on the competition with power-ups, fireball pitches, super strength, and Pablo Sanchez!
Play pick-up games, practice batting, and compete in single games or a whole season with simple, intuitive controls that anyone can master!
Game Modes:
Random Pick-up: A quick way to jump right in! The computer chooses a random team for you and itself, and the game starts immediately.
Single Game: You take turns with the computer to choose players from a random pool of characters.
Season: You create a team and manage it through a 14 game series. The opposing teams are computer generated. At the end of the season the best two teams advance to the BBL playoffs (best of 3). The winner advances to the championship series which consists of the Super Entire Nation Tournament (best of 3) and then the Ultra Grand Championship of the Universe Series (best of 5)!
Batting Practice: Choose a batter and face Mr. Clanky for some batting practice. This is where you’ll learn just when to click to make your chosen batter hit that ball!
T-ball - Select T-ball mode for more accessible game play. Simply click to hit, run, and field!
 
BACKYARD BASEBALL RULES
The rules for Backyard Baseball are a hybrid of Pro and Little League rules:
No leading off
No Injuries
Bunting is allowed
Tagging up is allowed
Stealing is allowed
 
At our core, we are fans first–not just of video games but of the Backyard Sports franchise. Fans have asked for accessible and legal ways to play their original Backyard titles for years, and we are excited to deliver. Without having access to the source code, there are hard limitations on the experience we can create. Backyard Baseball '97 runs buttery smooth for iOS devices, looks better than ever, and creates a new installation for digital preservation within the Backyard Sports catalog that allows the next generation of fans to fall in love with the title that started it all.
us.releaseNotes:
- Improved device compatibility
- Eliminate errors affecting players' saved data

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
us.releaseNotes:
- add Dual Blessing item
- improve Russian translation (thanks to katsune)
- redesign dialog boxes
- you can now reroll items in first rooms
- add tooltips on boss marks
- Virus was not fully working on enemies that use squirrels, poison puddles or fire arrows
- the MechaBanker boss was not appearing in endless mode
- now remember the last item position when using the Well of Oblivion
- the laser sound was sometimes too loud
- reduce a bit the max gems and vampire bats spawn rate
us.description:
Traverse the dungeon in this awesome action roguelite bullet hell inspired by The Binding Of Isaac and Tiny Rogues, where every choice could make or break your run. Stack over 100 different items and create powerful synergies to become truly overpowered with over 10 unique characters!

BALANCE RISK & REWARD
Balance risk and reward as your make your choices! Push your luck to grow your build, but don't overestimate your abilities, or your run could end on the spot. Navigate the dungeon wisely and reap the rewards to optimize your build to crush the dungeon with 10+ unique characters!​

BECOME OVERPOWERED
Over a hundred unique items can be mixed and matched to create a devastating build, laying waste to every enemy in sight! Be careful not to hurt yourself with an item that doesn't fit, and experiment with synergies to become an overpowered behemoth!​

FIND SECRETS
Uncover the secrets of the dungeon on your quest to slay the Villian to unlock hidden paths, uncover new items, and grow your band of adventurers! And for those who crave a challenge, the greatest rewards are locked behind the greatest trials!

PLAY WITH FRIENDS
Play solo or with others in local co-op, with up to 4 people! Combine character abilities to improve your odds, or do a mild amount of trolling, the choice is yours!

Please note that extra controllers are required to play with others.

us.description:
In a land far, far away there once was a vast continent called Milton. It was a land where the power of rule came by the sword and the arcane, where Men who devoted themselves to the blade or to magecraft, could become the finest warriors, wisest wizards or the greatest adventurers. In this land, there are several kingdoms divided by borders but united through history. Countless stories of alliances, upheaval, and moments of peace bedeck this tapestry, but that is a tale for another day. 

Our story begins in a remote kingdom to the north, Iblis, an obscure and oft-forgotten place. It is a wild and barren land, a place where its people scrape a living from the earth, mining minerals for the lords of the south. On occasion, adventurers would stop by for the night but never linger. Until one day, a fledgling adventurer lost his way and stumbled into a hole. The story might have ended then had he not come back, but return he did, with sacks of gold and glittering treasure. 

Like a fierce gale from the north, news of his fame and fortune fanned across the kingdoms overnight, and kings sent their bravest warriors and adventurers to clear the cavern of monsters in search of treasure. Even peasants wanting a part of this newfound wealth partook in these expeditions. In no time at all, a bustling town had sprung up in this forgotten place. People set up camps, and formed their own groups to explore the cave. Clever merchants not missing this opportunity, built taverns and shops near the cave, selling equipment and potions to eager adventurers. At first, everything seemed fine. As explorers delved into the caves, they encountered new creatures and discovered new treasures. Mysteries continued to pour forth from the cave, yet nobody knew where the source of the secrets lay. However, as the explorations continued, the balance of wealth beyond the cave began to waver, and cracks appeared among those adventurers who had previously worked arm-in-arm. The latecomers or weak, limited to wandering the upper levels of the cave, could only watch as the veteran adventurers brought treasure after treasure from the deep. They began harboring dark thoughts as they watched the veteran adventurers grow arrogant from their largesse, ordering people around, hoarding secrets from the rest. The place became a festering pool of suspicions and greed, mired in a jealous rage. 

It started with an adventurer disappearing in the cave. Rumors circulated he had found some legendary treasure and hoarded it for himself. Others said he had been guided to another world by some mysterious magic force in the cave. Still, the unspoken belief was that he had been murdered by a rival party and was buried somewhere beneath the caverns. Nobody knows exactly what happened, but people have continued to disappear ever since. As more people have gone missing, some adventurers have called it quits, others cling to hope, and a few continue to wait and see. Which brings us to you, an ordinary young man, coming into this extraordinary circumstance with purposes unknown to others. May you find what you seek in ...

--------------------------------------------------------
In " The Greedy Cave", you are a brave adventurer tasked with exploring a mysterious cave and battling all kinds of monsters.

Use your wits to defeat them, learn different skills, gain mighty equipment, challenge evil monster bosses, and decipher the mystery surrounding this cave...

Game Features
·Randomly generated cave levels provide a different game experience every time!                     
·Hundreds of monsters to defeat!
·Hundreds of equipment to collect!
·Hundreds of quests and achievements to conquer!
·Enchant/Reform/Level up/Gold collecting, and more abundant systems to explore!

Contact us
cs.thegreedycave@avalongames.com
https://www.facebook.com/greedycave/

us.description:
Ever wish your notes could do more? With Goodnotes 6, they can! Step into the future of note-taking with Goodnotes 6, the best AI notebook for iPad. Write notes, convert handwriting to text, annotate PDFs, and use AI tools for study and productivity. 

Boost Professional Efficiency and Productivity
• Use Ask Goodnotes to summarize, translate, and extract key insights from your notes, PDFs, and documents—perfect for your next important meeting.
• Import, annotate, and organize PDFs, documents, and meeting notes.
• Transcribe audio recordings from meetings so you never miss a detail.
• Present like a pro, with a built-in laser pointer that is perfect for meetings and presentations.
• Export and share notes via email, print, PDF, or images for easy collaboration.
• Send files directly to your unique Goodnotes email for quick access on all devices.
• New pen gestures like Scribble to Erase let you erase by scribbling, while Circle to Select helps you quickly select and edit notes—all without switching tools.
• Convert handwriting to text for quick and clean professional notes.
• Sync your notes across all devices with cloud sync through iCloud, Google Drive, OneDrive, Dropbox, and WebDAV.

Powerful Digital Notes and Study Tools
• Use AI-powered study tools help you learn faster and retain more information.
• Use Ask Goodnotes to generate practice quizzes, summarize text, or answer questions, directly from your handwriting.
• Powered by our in-house AI technology, Math Assist, converts handwriting to text on iPad and solves handwritten equations instantly.
• Convert equations to LaTeX format for easy use in reports and presentations.
• Memorize vocabulary and key concepts with AI-powered Study Sets using active recall and spaced repetition.
• No more flipping through pages: Handwriting search makes all your notes instantly searchable, even handwritten ones.
• Collaborate in real time with classmates by working on the same document for group projects and study sessions
• Record audio with live transcription while taking notes, so you never miss a detail. Easily edit, search, and remove text from the transcript to review key points faster.

Enhance Creative Digital Planning
• Design fully customizable notebooks, templates, and covers to fit your style.
• Mix handwriting, text, stickers, images, and drawings in a single notebook.
• Stay focused with Smart Timer, and boost your productivity.
• Browse the in-app Marketplace for stickers, washi tape patterns, as well as stylish templates, educational materials, and planners.
• Organize your notes with unlimited folders and advanced search.
• Get exclusive monthly downloads every month with a paid subscription.
• Use creative tools like pencil, tape, lasso tool, layering, eyedropper, and image cropping to make your planner truly yours.

Experience the best AI note app for students, professionals, and planners. Join millions of users who have transformed their workflow with Goodnotes 6, the best note-taking app for iPad. Download Goodnotes 6 for free and create your first notebook today.

Website: www.goodnotes.com
